Rulings.HAT:
● If "Dimensional Fissure" is applying, this card's ① cannot be activated.
● If you discard "Mermail Abyssgunde", and return that same Abyssgunde to the hand, Abyssgunde's effect will not activate.
Rulings.Vegas:
● If "Dimensional Fissure" is applying, this card's ① cannot be activated.
● If you discard "Mermail Abyssgunde", and return that same Abyssgunde to the hand, Abyssgunde's effect will not activate.
Rulings.Meadowlands:
● If "Dimensional Fissure" is applying, this card's ① cannot be activated.
● If you discard "Mermail Abyssgunde", and return that same Abyssgunde to the hand, Abyssgunde's effect will activate (this is a format-specific ruling).
Rulings.FireWater:
● If "Dimensional Fissure" is applying, this card's ① cannot be activated.
● If you discard "Mermail Abyssgunde", and return that same Abyssgunde to the hand, Abyssgunde's effect will not activate.

PSCT.Vegas:
① When this card is Normal/Special Summoned: You can discard 1 WATER to the GY, 
then target 1 Level 3 or lower WATER monster in your GY; add that target to your hand. 
(You can only use the effect of "Mermail Abyssturge" once per turn.)
